Package lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.analyzer

Interface Summary
ClassAnalyser Common interface for analysing classes
ClassWalker Interface to walk through classes from a .jar files.
ClassWalkListener Interface that should be implemented for listening ClassDirectoryWalker events
 

Class Summary
AbstractClassWalkListener Abstract class providing a basic implementation of a ClassWalkListener.
ClassDirectoryWalker Utility class used to walk through classes from a directory hierarchy containing either .class files or .jar files.
 

Exception Summary
ClassWalkerExecutionException Runtime exception that is thrown while the scanner is in action to return error issues This is a checked exception used to convert the unchecked exception ClassWalkerRuntimeException
ClassWalkerRuntimeException Runtime exception that is thrown while the scanner is in action to return error issues This is an unchecked exception to allow its usage while wrapping a DirectoryWalker
